description: This course examines the democratic structure, function and powers of local government in Australia, using Queensland as a model. The course will explore the regulation of town planning and land development, including the zoning subdivision control and rights of appeal.
restricted:
GCAppLaw, GDipAppLaw, MAppLaw, LLM, LLM(Adv), LLM(#16), LLM(#24)
Quota: Minimum of 12 enrolments
